name: KIDPOD
tagline: The smart audio system for children engaging learning through playing
description: We are creator of KIDPOD, the smart audio player for children, that interacts with KIDPAL or its brothers, changing the way children listen to stories and music. Your child just pops a KIDPAL on top, the audio adventure then begins. It is the most intuitive way for young listeners and it follows Montessori principles of children's tactile learners.
